users.name: Jade Plant
users.water: Water this plant 2-3 quarts every 2-3 days. If you happen to forget a day, don't over water this thing, or it will get angry at you.
users.soil: Change this soil at least once every six months, and each year, increase the pot size 1 ince, until you hit a 17 ince diameter pot.
users.social: I had this plant in the corner of a fairly dark room, and it has survived for 2+ years.
users.light: Medium amounts of sun, meaning 6-8 of direct sunlight is best.  If you have it by a window, make sure that it gets some shade during the day.
users.about: Learn all you need to know about this plant.
